markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Blackfrost Prophet](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2498)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

With their hulking physiques and the potent connection to the Crown of the World, saumen kar who succumb to blackfrost become especially dangerous blackfrost dead. Those who guarded the Temple of Aqakaru in life continue to do so in undeath, albeit even more vigilantly and much more violently. Blackfrost prophets, as these wardens are sometimes known, maintain their formidable intellect and innate connection to their boreal environment, though the curse of blackfrost has stripped them of their memories and filled their hearts with evil.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 31

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Blackfrost_Prophet.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Blackfrost Prophet](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2498)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 81</row>

**Perception** +21; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Erutaki](/Languages.aspx?ID=54), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +4

**Con** +5

**Int** +2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [halberd](/Weapons.aspx?ID=26)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +20 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +18 

</row>

**HP** 180
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet; ice climb 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_halberd_ +21 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d10+10 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
horns +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d6+6 bludgeoning plus 2d6 cold and [blackfrost](/Curses.aspx?ID=51)

**Imprison Mind** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The blackfrost prophet concentrates on a creature within 60 feet, filling the target's mind with befuddling susurrations. The creature must succeed at a DC 28 Will save or take 4d8+8 mental damage and become [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 minute (stupefied 2 on a critical failure). The creature is [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) as long as it's stupefied.

**Raise Blackfrost** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The blackfrost prophet selects a point within 60 feet, then calls upon shards of blackfrost to stab up through the crust in a 30-foot burst. Creatures in the area take 2d8 piercing damage plus 2d8 cold damage (DC 28 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). A creature that takes cold damage from this ability is exposed to [blackfrost](/Curses.aspx?ID=51). Until the next time the blackfrost prophet uses Raise Blackfrost, the affected area is difficult terrain.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-333" />
name: Blackfrost Prophet
